name: Cracked Wheat With Mushroom Puree

ingredients.name: any leftover mushroom-soaking liquid from mushroom puree
chicken or vegetable stock or water

instructions: Measure mushroom-soaking liquid, and add stock or water as needed to make 2 cups. Bring to boil. Combine liquid and cracked wheat in a bowl, stir, cover and set aside until all liquid is absorbed, 45 minutes.
Stir in mushroom puree and salt and pepper. Serve at room temperature, or reheat gently in microwave or low oven or over low heat before serving.
